name: Profil3r
description: Checks for email accounts given a username or possible parts of username.  Also permutates possible usernames given First name, Last name, or other given info

parameters.name: Full username OR parts of username
parameters.description: Include or leave out first, middle, last name - Keep in mind people usually use FirstMLast@gmail.com - So johnfdoe is an example if First M Last are all known
